verses.text: We \w have|strong="H1121"\w* heard \w with|strong="H1121"\w* our ears, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, our fathers \w have|strong="H1121"\w* told us, what work thou didst \w in|strong="H1121"\w* their days, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* days \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H3117"\w* \w didst|strong="H6466"\w* drive \w out|strong="H6466"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* nations \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H8085"\w* hand, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* plantedst \w them|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w*; \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* \w didst|strong="H6466"\w* afflict \w the|strong="H8085"\w* peoples, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w didst|strong="H6466"\w* spread \w them|strong="H8085"\w* abroad.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* gat \w not|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* land \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3423"\w* \w own|strong="H3027"\w* \w sword|strong="H3027"\w*, neither did \w their|strong="H3423"\w* \w own|strong="H3027"\w* \w arm|strong="H3027"\w* save \w them|strong="H7971"\w*: \w but|strong="H7489"\w* \w thy|strong="H7971"\w* right \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w thine|strong="H7971"\w* \w arm|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* light \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w thy|strong="H7971"\w* countenance, \w because|strong="H3027"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* hadst \w a|strong="H3068"\w* favour \w unto|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H6440"\w* art \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w King|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*: command \w deliverance|strong="H3467"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Jacob.

Through \w thee|strong="H6680"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* push \w down|strong="H6680"\w* \w our|strong="H6680"\w* adversaries: through \w thy|strong="H4428"\w* name \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* tread \w them|strong="H6680"\w* under \w that|strong="H1931"\w* rise \w up|strong="H4428"\w* \w against|strong="H6680"\w* us.

\w For|strong="H8034"\w* \w I|strong="H6862"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w not|strong="H6965"\w* trust \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* bow, neither \w shall|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* sword save \w me|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* hast \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H2719"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* adversaries, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* hast put \w them|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* shame \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hate \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3588"\w* God \w have|strong="H6862"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* made \w our|strong="H3588"\w* boast \w all|strong="H3467"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* day long, \w and|strong="H6862"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3467"\w* give thanks unto \w thy|strong="H3467"\w* name \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever. \qs Selah\qs*

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w now|strong="H3117"\w* \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* hast \w cast|strong="H3034"\w* \add us \add*off, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* brought \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* dishonour; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* goest not \w forth|strong="H1984"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* hosts.

Thou makest \w us|strong="H2186"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w turn|strong="H2186"\w* \w back|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* adversary: \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w which|strong="H6635"\w* hate \w us|strong="H2186"\w* spoil \w for|strong="H6635"\w* themselves.

\w Thou|strong="H7725"\w* hast given \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w sheep|strong="H4480"\w* \add appointed \add*\w for|strong="H4480"\w* meat; \w and|strong="H7725"\w* hast scattered \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* nations.

\w Thou|strong="H5414"\w* sellest \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* nought, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* hast \w not|strong="H5414"\w* increased \add thy wealth \add*\w by|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* price.

Thou makest \w us|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* reproach \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w our|strong="H5971"\w* neighbours, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* scorn \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* derision \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w them|strong="H4376"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w round|strong="H5971"\w* \w about|strong="H5971"\w* \w us|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H7760"\w* \w makest|strong="H7760"\w* \w us|strong="H5439"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* byword \w among|strong="H2781"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* nations, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shaking \w of|strong="H2781"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* head \w among|strong="H2781"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* peoples.

All \w the|strong="H7760"\w* day long \w is|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* dishonour before \w me|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* shame \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* face \w hath|strong="H1471"\w* covered \w me|strong="H7760"\w*,

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* reproacheth \w and|strong="H3117"\w* blasphemeth; \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w reason|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* enemy \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* avenger.

\w All|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* come \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w*; yet have \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6440"\w* forgotten \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*, neither have \w we|strong="H3068"\w* dealt falsely \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* covenant.

\w Our|strong="H3605"\w* heart \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* turned back, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* steps declined \w from|strong="H3605"\w* \w thy|strong="H7911"\w* \w way|strong="H2063"\w*;

\w That|strong="H4480"\w* thou hast sore broken \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* place \w of|strong="H4480"\w* jackals, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* covered \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H4480"\w* death.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* forgotten \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w or|strong="H3588"\w* spread forth \w our|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* strange god;

\w Shall|strong="H2114"\w* not God search this \w out|strong="H6566"\w*? \w for|strong="H8034"\w* \w he|strong="H3709"\w* knoweth \w the|strong="H7911"\w* secrets \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* heart.

\w Yea|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w thy|strong="H3045"\w* sake \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* killed \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* day long; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* counted \w as|strong="H3588"\w* sheep \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* slaughter.

Awake, \w why|strong="H5921"\w* sleepest \w thou|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord? arise, cast \add us \add*\w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*.
\w Wherefore|strong="H4100"\w* hidest \w thou|strong="H4100"\w* \w thy|strong="H5782"\w* face, \w and|strong="H3462"\w* forgettest our affliction \w and|strong="H3462"\w* our oppression?

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w our|strong="H6440"\w* soul \w is|strong="H4100"\w* bowed \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* dust: \w our|strong="H6440"\w* belly cleaveth \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth.
Rise up \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* help, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* redeem \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy lovingkindnessâ€™ sake.
